code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./index.css';import Dashboard from'./components/Dashboard';import Authorization from'./components/Authorization';import{useNavigate,Route,Routes}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[isLoggedIn,setIsLoggedIn]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=(username,password)=>{const storedUsername='admin';const storedPassword='123';if(username===storedUsername&&password===storedPassword){setIsLoggedIn(true);localStorage.setItem('authenticated','true');navigate('/dashboard');}else{alert('Invalid credentials. Please try again.');}};const handleLogout=()=>{setIsLoggedIn(false);localStorage.removeItem('authenticated');};React.useEffect(()=>{const loggedInStatus=localStorage.getItem('authenticated');if(loggedInStatus==='true'){setIsLoggedIn(true);}},[]);if(isLoggedIn){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Routes,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/dashboard",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dashboard,{})})})});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Authorization,{setLogin:handleLogin});};export default App;
